values.comment: If you have equal or less minions than your opponent and you have more than 12 HP, you will NEVER play this.
If the enemy has 2 or less minions more than you and you have both Malfurion in hand and 7 or more mana, you will never play this.
values.condition: opp_minions(count()) - my_minions(count()) < 3 AND my_hand(count(), cardid = ICC_832) > 0 AND my_hero(count(), mana) > 6
